00057 
00058 // when dissecting an entity this lets the parent dissector know if
00059 // the left have side can be assigned. Usually this will be MM_OK,
00060 // but in cases of 'readonly', 'constant' variables it may be
00061 // protected and hence MU_CONSTANT.
00062 // Entityies that are not storage mechanisms are given MU_IMPOSSIBLE,
00063 // like:
00064 //    myFunction() = 5;
00065 enum MavenMutability {
00066         MU_OK = 0,
00067         MU_CONSTANT = 1,
00068         MU_IMPOSSIBLE = 2
00069 };

00078

00080         MavenDissectBlock();
00081         void reset();
00082         void trim();
00083 };

00345         string lastStatament;

00347 public:
00348         // options
00349         bool   option_c;           // Compile object file but do not link
00350         bool   option_e;           // Execute after compilation.
00351         bool   option_h;           // Show help and quit.
00352         string option_i;           // Input file(s)
00353         bool   option_K;           // Keep CPP and MMAP
00354         string option_n;           // Result executable/object name.
00355         string option_o;           // Optimisation level (GNU specific.)
00356         bool   option_r;           // Show compilation statistics.
00357         int    option_s;           // Object-safe level
00358         bool   option_v;           // Print version and quit.
00359         bool   option_V;           // Show all compiler variables before compiling.
00360         string option_w;           // Supress specific warning.
00361         string option_W;           // Show specific warning.
00362         bool   option_x;           // Do not compile or link (no input file required.)
00363         string option_doc_sql;     // Place for SQL documentation.
00364         string option_doc_sqlite3; // Place for SQLite3 documentation.
00365         string option_doc_xml;     // Place for XML documentation.
00366         string option_base_path;   // where maven was originally executed from
00367         
00368 public:
00369         MavenCompiler();
